alert.note: Alert for Rankin; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:06PM CDT until June 30 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Smith County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pulaski, or near Morton, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Polkville around 715 PM CDT. Pelahatchie around 730 PM CDT. Johns around 745 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
